answerText: Luigi Pirandello [10] This most famous work by Pirandello, in which the Manager gets angry with the titular family, forms a trilogy with Each in His Own Way and Tonight We Improvise.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Pittsburgh A and Walter Johnson High School | 14 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one of this man's plays, Signora Frola and Signor Ponza accuses each other of madness.  [10] Identify this author who set The Mountain Giants in a fantasy world, and who also wrote The Young and the Old and The Late Mattia Pascal.
